title: Ralph React Ink UI - Modern terminal dashboard
description: Rewrite Ralph's terminal UI using React Ink + Bun. Replace shell escape codes with a component-based, live-updating dashboard. This solves all UI issues (truncation, wrapping, live updates) in one clean rewrite.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Create ralph-ui/ directory with Bun + React Ink setup
Create package.json with dependencies: ink, react, ink-spinner
Create src/index.tsx entry point
Create components/Dashboard.tsx - main layout container
Create components/PRDStatus.tsx - stories + criteria counts
Create components/StoryBox.tsx - current story with progress bar
Create components/IterationHeader.tsx - iteration number, model, time
Create components/NotificationStatus.tsx - topic with proper wrapping
Create components/ProgressBar.tsx - reusable progress bars
Create hooks/useFileWatch.ts - watch prd-json/ for live updates
Create hooks/usePRDStats.ts - calculate stories/criteria counts
Update ralph.zsh to call: bun ralph-ui/src/index.tsx --mode=startup
Update ralph.zsh to call: bun ralph-ui/src/index.tsx --mode=iteration
Live update: criteria count changes when Claude checks off items
Notification topic wraps to next line instead of truncating
All text fits within terminal width (responsive)
Test: Run Ralph, verify live dashboard updates
Test: Resize terminal, verify responsive layout
CONSIDER: Move ralph-setup wizard to React Ink as well
- Currently uses Gum (works but separate tooling)
- React Ink wizard would unify UI stack
- Could be follow-up story if scope too big
Commit changes with message: feat/fix: [STORY-ID] description
